title: 6.3.4 Create trial API endpoints and tests
body:
## Parent Issue
#25 - 6.3 Trial Management System

## Objective
Create API endpoints for trial status and extension.

## Endpoints
- GET /api/v1/trial/status - Get trial status and usage
- POST /api/v1/trial/extend - Extend trial (one-time)

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/api/routers/trial.py`
- `tests/services/test_trial.py`
- `tests/api/test_trial_api.py`

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Status endpoint returns all usage metrics
- [ ] Extend endpoint works once only
- [ ] Tests cover all scenarios
- [ ] 80%+ coverage

## Estimated Time
2 hours
